Stuff I've Built

Outside of work, I enjoy working on personal projects to learn new skills and create fun things.

coach.me

A data powered fitness companion to help you train smarter. Built using nextjs, deployed to vercel, and powered by OpenAI.

cookbook.v2

A CLI to quickly clone personal project recipes and eliminate boilerplate - reducing time to deployment and increasing iteration speed.

htmx-live-chat

A barebones realtime chat application powered by htmx, built as a learning exercise and exploration of htmx.

Teamwork

I'm thankful to have worked with other talented developers, and I've learned alot from them.

Postman App

An all in one marketplace, package tracker and shipping label generator developed for loyal customers of The Postman Seattle, a local shipping business and community staple. Senior capstone project.

Musion

Light wrapper around the Spotify APIs to enable listening parties, built as a school project.

Contact Me

I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations, so don't hesitate to reach out! Let's build something great together.
